alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 11:41AM CST until March 06 at 9:45AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, County Road 372 will begin flooding near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:15 AM CST Saturday was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Black River Annapolis 8.0 10.6 7.7 6.4 5.6 5.1 4.8 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
